why-me.title: Why me
why-me.description: I am an aspiring frontend developer with a strong interest in web and software development. Programming excites me because it allows me to turn creative ideas into functional solutions while continuously learning new things. I am particularly motivated by problem-solving and the sense of achievement when an application works exactly as intended. My goal is to continuously develop my skills and pursue a long-term career as a frontend or web developer.

my-skills.title: My Skills
my-skills.description: I am always happy to learn new technologies, just tell me what you need.

join.description: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

sharkie.description: 2D action game based on an object-oriented approach. Control Sharkie underwater and defeat enemies by shooting bubbles.

contact.title: Contact me
contact.description: I look forward to hearing from you. I am seeking a position as a frontend or web developer and am motivated to contribute to new projects and apply my skills.
contact.accept-after: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
